description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, experience, and projects. It includes a clean, responsive design and is built with React.js.
keyFeatures: Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Portfolio section with project details and links
About me section with skills and technologies

description: A weather forecasting application that provides real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. Built with React.js and Axios for API integration.
keyFeatures: Real-time weather data with dynamic city search
Displays temperature, humidity, and wind speed
Ability to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit
